title: NECA Ultimate T-1000 Terminator Action Figure, 2-7"
features: Based on the 1991 film Terminator 2: Judgment Day
Authorized likeness of actor Robert Patrick
T-1000 stands about 7 inches tall with nearly 30 points of articulation
Accessories included: 11 interchangeable parts (3 heads, 2 forearms, 5 hands, 1 battle-damaged shirt front); pistol with functional holster
WIndow box packaging with opening flap
description: To prepare for the 25th anniversary of Terminator 2 in 2016, we present the definitive collector's version of the T-1000! The T-1000 is our third Ultimate from the 1991 film, and the perfect companion piece to the Ultimate T-800 and Ultimate Sarah Connor figures. This deluxe 7" scale action figure features the authorized likeness of Robert Patrick and nearly 30 points of articulation. It comes loaded with accessories to help recreate your favorite action scenes from T2: a whopping 11 interchangeable parts (3 heads, 2 forearms, 5 hands, 1 battle-damaged shirt front) plus pistol accessory with functional holster. Comes in window box packaging with opening flap.
